pages.text: Nether Fortresses, or just Fortresses, are large buildings of $(l:blocks/netherrack)nether bricks$(), mainly in the shape of bridges and corridors, with pillars extending to the ground, if they are not on the ground already.$(br2)Main loot of fortresses are $(l:mobs/skeleton)wither skeleton$() skulls, $(l:mobs/blaze)blazes$() (which can also appear from spawners) and $(l:blocks/nether_wart)nether warts$().
